mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart ( seq, member_id, product_num, qty ) VALUES ( #{seq}, #{memberId}, #{productNum}, #{qty} )
mapper.select: SELECT seq, member_id, product_num, qty FROM cart WHERE seq = #{seq}
Select c.*, o.*, p.price, p.product_name from options o, cart c, product p where o.seq = c.option_seq and c.member_id = #{memberId} and c.product_num = p.product_num
